I think I have just the perfect fit for you!

If you're looking for a classic and heartwarming tale of adolescence, I highly recommend "Little Women" (1868). It's a beautiful coming-of-age story about four sisters growing up during post-Civil War America, with wonderful performances from its all-female cast. The themes of sisterhood, love, and self-discovery will surely resonate with you!

If you're in the mood for something more contemporary, "The Shadows" (2015) is a great option. It's a thrilling tale of a writer who gets entangled in a web of danger and deception after hitting a young man while driving. With its unique blend of mystery, suspense, and romance, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
